name: Renderer
description: Abstract rendering interface with multiple backend implementations (PixiJS, Canvas2D, Three.js). Provides consistent API for drawing sprites, meshes, and effects.

properties.name: canvas
properties.description: The canvas element being rendered to

properties.name: camera
properties.description: The active camera controlling the view

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the screen with the background color

methods.name: present
methods.description: Presents the rendered frame to the screen
methods.example:
// Called after all drawing is complete
renderer.present();

methods.name: drawSprite
methods.description: Draws a sprite at the specified position

methods.name: drawMesh
methods.description: Draws a mesh (polygon) with the specified vertices
methods.signature: drawMesh(vertices: Vector2[], color: number, transform: Transform): void

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Fill color as hex (e.g., 0xFF0000 for red)

parameters.name: transform
parameters.description: Transform to apply to the mesh

methods.name: drawLine
methods.description: Draws a line between two points
methods.signature: drawLine(start: Vector2, end: Vector2, color: number, thickness?: number): void

methods.name: drawCircle
methods.description: Draws a circle at the specified position
methods.signature: drawCircle(position: Vector2, radius: number, color: number, fill?: boolean): void

methods.name: drawText
methods.description: Draws text at the specified position
methods.signature: drawText(text: string, position: Vector2, style?: TextStyle): void

methods.name: setCamera
methods.description: Sets the active camera for rendering

parameters.name: camera
parameters.description: Camera instance to use for rendering

methods.name: screenToWorld
methods.description: Converts screen coordinates to world coordinates

methods.name: worldToScreen
methods.description: Converts world coordinates to screen coordinates
